translations.chinese: 上曰：「通侯諸將毋敢隱朕，皆言其情。
translations.english: The emperor said: "Noble marquises and generals, do not dare conceal from me. All speak your true feelings.
Why did I obtain the world?

translations.chinese: 項氏之所以失天下者 何？」
translations.english: Why did the Xiang clan lose the world?"

translations.chinese: 高起、王陵對曰：「陛下嫚而侮人，項羽仁而敬人。
translations.english: Gao Qi and Wang Ling replied: "Your Majesty is casual and insults people. Xiang Yu is benevolent and respects people.

translations.chinese: 然陛下使人攻城略地，所降下者，因以與之，與天下同利也。
translations.english: However, when Your Majesty sends people to attack cities and seize territory, those who surrender are given it, sharing the world's benefits with them.
